MemoryInfobox.description: 'Following a direct attack from the Followers of Ares, a politician finally decided to take action against them and to alert the temple.'

General_Description: '''Cultibility''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After saving a statesman when he was attacked by the [[Followers of Ares]], Kassandra was charged by him to kill more of them.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Politician:''' ''Thank you for jumping in. Come to think of it, I could use a [[mercenary]] of your caliber.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you're paying, I'm listening.''
*'''Politician:''' ''Those were Followers of [[Ares]]! I can scarcely believe they are attacking people openly like this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Whether you believe it or not, they will kill you. Be more careful, friend.''
*'''Politician:''' ''You're right. This is serious. I... We must strike against them. And send a warning to the priestess at the temple.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So I should send them all to the [[underworld]]?''
*'''Politician:''' ''Yes. All the Followers must die.''
(Accept – "I'll handle it.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.''
*'''Politician:''' ''You're doing me a service, mercenary.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.''
Kassandra left the man, sought out the Followers camping nearby, and killed them before returning to the politician.
*'''Politician:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Politician:''' ''You kept your end of the deal. Now it's time I hold up mine. Take this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I always finish what I've started.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew some of the Followers of Ares in the region, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
{{ACODMemories}}
[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
[[Category:Memories relived using the Animus HR-8.5]]
